greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of the square excess A056892 of the primes between two squares.
comment: Consider the primes p1,...,pK between two squares n^2 and (n+1)^2, and take the sum of the differences: (p1 - n^2) + ... + (pK - n^2). Obviously this equals (sum of these primes) - (number of these primes) * n^2.
xref: Row sums of A056892, read as a table.
results.author: _M. F. Hasler_, Oct 19 2018
